overview: Follows television icon Marc Summers, the host of Nickelodeon's Double Dare and Food Network's Unwrapped, as he rehearses and develops the one-man live theater show about his life in his hometown. Along the way, we'll meet Summers' fans, former colleagues, teachers, mentors, family, friends and the real man himself behind the camera
tagline: A new documentary about the messiest man in show business.
title: On Your Marc
